```{r}
#| label: cvevents
cvevents <- function(tbl, when, what, where, descr) {

    command_start <- "\\cvevent"
    tbl[[where]] <- gsub("\n", " \\\\newline ", tbl[[where]])
    res <- paste0(
        command_start, "{", tbl[[when]], "}", 
        "{", tbl[[what]], "}",
        "{", tbl[[where]], "}",
        "{", tbl[[descr]], "}"
        )

    cat(res, sep = "\n\n\n")
}

cvproj <- function(tbl,what,role,items){
    command_start <- "\\cvproj"
    res <- paste0(
        command_start, "{", tbl[[what]], "}",
        "{", tbl[[role]], "}",
        "{", sapply(tbl[[items]], function(x)paste0(x,collapse = ", ")), "}"
    )

    cat(res, sep = "\n\n\n")
}
```

# Summary

Lecturer and researcher in economics and data science. Trained in economics with heavy use of various types of econometric and statistical models for policy-oriented research. Have a long exposure with Stata, R, and Python for data analytics, econometrics, and machine learning.  Good familiarity with various data & docs processing tools (Microsoft Office, Google Docs, Markdown, and Quarto).
